prompt:
A highly alluring Korean woman in her 20s sitting on the wooden engawa veranda at a seaside
ryokan, ocean breeze, golden hour.
Pose: knees drawn close to chest, arms loosely wrapped around legs, shoulders relaxed; head
slightly tilted with direct eye contact, half-lidded eyes, soft parted lips, no smile.
Outfit: soft ribbed cotton tank + high-waist lounge shorts (tasteful), visible knit texture and
micro-wrinkles.
Lighting: strong backlight edge on hair/shoulder + pale wood bounce fill, smooth highlight
roll-off, mild sun bloom.
Camera: 50mm, f/1.8, handheld candid. Film: Portra 400, subtle grain, smooth tonal transitions.
Exclusions: no text/logos/watermark; realistic pores; avoid perfect symmetry; no HDR, no
hyper-clarity, no over-sharpening.
